body_html: @fchollet I'm not sure if you've actually started on this ticket yet, but I have been reading through the Keras code lately and wouldn't mind taking a stab at addressing this issue if that would be helpful. I'm currently rolling with a similar workaround so I have a vested interest in getting this resolved.
